author: mbautin
msg: [master] Add the dispersion information about favored nodes into the region verification report
The motivation is to check and verify regions who shared the same region server won't share the same secondary/tertiary region server.

It matters when one region server is down, all the regions previously on this dead region server will be dispersed into their secondary and tertiary region servers. The more these secondary/tertiary region server could be distributed, the faster HBase could be recovery. Also it could keep regions balanced across all the region servers.
For each region server, we defined 2 dispersion related metric: dispersion num and dispersion score.
Dispersion num:  The number of the unique secondary/tertiary region servers for the regions who shared this RS as the primary region server.
Dispersion score: Dispersion num / the number regions who shared this RS as the primary region server.
Thanks Kannan for all the suggestions !
Test Plan: tested on migrate cluster

author: mbautin
msg: [jira] [HBASE-5684] [89-fb] Make ProcessBasedLocalHBaseCluster run HDFS and make it more robust
Currently ProcessBasedLocalHBaseCluster runs on top of raw local filesystem. We
need it to start a process-based HDFS cluster as well. We also need to make the
whole thing more stable so we can use it in unit tests.
Also all logs of local HBase cluster daemons are now tailed to the primary log
of the unit test with the appropriate prefixes to make debugging easier.
Run the new unit test multiple times (10x or 50x).
